Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
org.seed.core.data.AbstractSystemEntityComponent
org.seed.core.data.AbstractSystemEntityService<User>
org.seed.core.user.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener, SystemEntityService<User>, UserChangeAware, UserGroupDependent<User>, UserService, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<org.springframework.security.authentication.event.AuthenticationSuccessEvent>
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends AbstractSystemEntityService<User> implements UserService, UserChangeAware, UserGroupDependent<User>, org.springframework.context.ApplicationListener<org.springframework.security.authentication.event.AuthenticationSuccessEvent>
